revision.text:
'''Johto''' is the second [[region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 103 Pokémon from Chikorita to Celebi (which can be found in [[Ilex Forest]]). [[File:Pokeclickerjohto.png|thumb|A Town Map of the Johto region]] ===List of Johto locations=== ====Towns and [[Shops]]==== {| class="wikitable" |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|New Bark Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cherrygrove City]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Violet City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Azelea Town]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Goldenrod City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Ecruteak City]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Olivine City]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Cianwood City]] |- | [[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Mahogany Town]] || [[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Blackthorn City]] ||[[Towns_%26_Cities#Johto_Cities_.26_Towns|Indigo Plateau Johto]] |} ====Routes==== ''See [[Route Statistics]] for more in-depth info.'' {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" !
